Initial commit - NovviaERP

WPF ERP-System mit JTL-Wawi Integration:
- NovviaERP.Core: Business Logic, Services, Entities
- NovviaERP.WPF: Windows Desktop Client
- NovviaERP.Worker: Background Services
- NovviaERP.API: REST API

Features:
- MSV3 Pharma-Grosshandel Anbindung \(GEHE, Phoenix, Sanacorp\)
- WooCommerce Shop-Sync
- Versand-Labels \(DHL, DPD, GLS, UPS\)
- Dokumenten-Ausgabe \(Druck, E-Mail, PDF\)
- Mahnwesen, RMA/Retouren
- ABdata Pharma-Stammdaten
